query:
WITH updated AS (
            UPDATE agent_sessions
            SET
                status = 'idle',
                user_id = $2,
                agent_type = $3,
                model = $4,
                mode = $5,
                updated_at = NOW(),
                last_heartbeat = NOW(),
                completed_at = NULL,
                error_message = NULL,
                current_task = NULL
            WHERE chat_id = $1
            RETURNING *
        )
        SELECT
            u.id,
            u.workspace_id,
            u.chat_id,
            u.user_id,
            u.agent_type as "agent_type: AgentType",
            u.status as "status: SessionStatus",
            u.model,
            u.mode,
            u.current_task,
            u.error_message,
            u.created_at,
            u.updated_at,
            u.last_heartbeat,
            u.completed_at,
            f.name as "chat_name?"
        FROM updated u
        LEFT JOIN files f ON u.chat_id = f.id
